question.question_text: A car is traveling along a straight rode at a constant speed of 100mph for 5 hours calculate the total distance traveled

retrieved_documents.page_content:
Input Example: a car accelerates from rest and reaches a velocity of {{params.v}} {{params.unitsspeed}} in {{params.t}} {{params.unitstime}}. the distance traveled by the car in {{params.unitsdistance}} is: Output Example:

A car accelerates from rest and reaches a velocity of {{params.v}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} in {{params.t}} {{params.unitsTime}}.

The distance traveled by the car in {{params.unitsDistance}} is:

Input Example: a car travels at a speed of 60 km/h for 2 hours, at a speed of 40 km/h for 3 hours, at a speed of 50 km/h for 1 hour. what is average speed (in km/h)? Output Example:

A car travels at a speed of {{params.v1}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} for {{params.t1}} {{params.unitsTime}}, at a speed of {{params.v2}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} for {{params.t2}} {{params.unitsTime}}, at a speed of {{params.v3}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} for {{params.t3}} {{params.unitsTime}}.

What is average speed (in {{params.unitsSpeed}})?
